title: Need a new Mac? Amazon has great deals for Prime Day
description: Macworld If you’re in the market for a new Mac, the good news is, yes, there is another Amazon Prime Day this Tuesday and Wednesday! This time the Amazon sale is dubbed Prime Big Deal Days and it will run from just after midnight Tuesday, October 8 to midnight Wednesday, October 9. In our experience you can get discounts on Macs all year round, but, some of the best Mac discounts fall during Amazon’s sales. The Amazon Prime Day sale is a great time way to save some money when buying a new Mac. The October sale comes at a time when you might be thinking about your holiday shopping, plus with new Macs (Mac mini and MacBook Pro) expected later in October, now could be a great time to pick up some bargains. Below you will find links to the different types of Mac desktops available on Amazon, so it will be easy to find the best deals. If you aren’t sure which Mac to buy read our Mac buying guide where we compare every Mac and MacBook. The Macs picked here are all chosen by our editors, who have decades of experience with Apple devices. We’ve reviewed everything we recommend and we won’t tell you to buy something that’s not an actual deal. The products below are all at or near all-time lows, and we’ve selected what we think is the best configuration for each product type. We know Apple is expensive, so we’ve chosen products at prices we would be willing to pay, so you can trust that our recommendations will steer you in the right direction—and save you big bucks. During the 48 hours of Amazon October Prime Deals Day we will be tracking the sales, so be sure to check this page often as the deals change constantly. We also have a round-up of all the Apple Amazon Prime Day deals so check it out if you need other Apple gear. Best Prime Day Mac deals These are the biggest savings we have found on all Macs. You can find even more deals on specific desktop Mac models in the sections below. html:
Image: IDG

If you’re in the market for a new Mac, the good news is, yes, there is another Amazon Prime Day this Tuesday and Wednesday! This time the Amazon sale is dubbed Prime Big Deal Days and it will run from just after midnight Tuesday, October 8 to midnight Wednesday, October 9. In our experience you can get discounts on Macs all year round, but, some of the best Mac discounts fall during Amazon’s sales.

The Amazon Prime Day sale is a great time way to save some money when buying a new Mac. The October sale comes at a time when you might be thinking about your holiday shopping, plus with new Macs (Mac mini and MacBook Pro) expected later in October, now could be a great time to pick up some bargains.

Below you will find links to the different types of Mac desktops available on Amazon, so it will be easy to find the best deals. If you aren’t sure which Mac to buy read our Mac buying guide where we compare every Mac and MacBook.

The Macs picked here are all chosen by our editors, who have decades of experience with Apple devices. We’ve reviewed everything we recommend and we won’t tell you to buy something that’s not an actual deal. The products below are all at or near all-time lows, and we’ve selected what we think is the best configuration for each product type. We know Apple is expensive, so we’ve chosen products at prices we would be willing to pay, so you can trust that our recommendations will steer you in the right direction—and save you big bucks.

During the 48 hours of Amazon October Prime Deals Day we will be tracking the sales, so be sure to check this page often as the deals change constantly. We also have a round-up of all the Apple Amazon Prime Day deals so check it out if you need other Apple gear.

These are the biggest savings we have found on all Macs. You can find even more deals on specific desktop Mac models in the sections below.

U.S. Mac Prime Day deals

  • M2 Mac mini, 256GB: $500 ($99 off with coupon, MSRP $599)
  • M2 Mac mini, 512GB: $690 ($109 off with coupon, MSRP $799)
  • M2 Pro Mac mini, 512GB: $1,149 ($150 off, MSRP $1,299)
  • M3 iMac, 8-core GPU, 256GB: $1,148 ($151 off, MSRP $1,299)
  • M3 iMac, 10-core GPU, 256GB: $1,350 ($149 off after coupon, MSRP $1,499)
  • Apple Studio Display, $1,295 ($304 off, MSRP $1,599)

U.K. Mac Prime Day deals

  • M2 Pro Mac mini, 512GB: £1,254.97 (£144 off, RRP £1,399)
  • M3 iMac, 8-core GPU, 256GB: £1,329 (£70 off, RRP £1,399)
  • M3 iMac, 10-core GPU, 512GB: £1,679 (£120 off, RRP £1,799)

For more Mac mini deals see Best Mac mini deals and for more iMac deals see Best iMac Deals.

Apple doesn’t sell the Mac Studio on Amazon. If you want to save money on a new Mac Studio take a look at our Mac Studio deals roundup, or check out the Apple Refurbished Store in the U.S. or the Apple Refurbished Store in the U.K.

Best Prime Day MacBook deals

These are the biggest savings we have found on all MacBooks. You can find even more deals on MacBooks in our separate round-up of the best Amazon Prime MacBook Air and MacBook Pro deals.

U.S. MacBook Prime Day deals

  • M2 13-inch MacBook Air, 256GB: $749 ($250 off, MSRP $999) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • M3 13-inch MacBook Air, 256GB: $849 ($250 off, MSRP $1,099) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • M3 13-inch MacBook Air, 512GB: $1,049 ($250 off, MSRP $1,299)
  • M3 15-inch MacBook Air, 256GB: $1,044 ($255 off, MSRP $1,299) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • M3 15-inch MacBook Air, 512GB: $1,234 ($265 off, MSRP $1,499) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • M3 14-inch MacBook Pro, 512GB: $1,299 ($300 off, MSRP $1,599)
  • M3 Max 16-inch MacBook Pro, 48GB RAM, 1TB: $3,499 ($500 off, MSRP $3,999)

U.K. MacBook Prime Day deals

  • M2 13-inch MacBook Air, 256GB: £899 (£100 off, RRP £999)
  • M3 13-inch MacBook Air, M3 (8-core GPU, 8GB RAM, 256GB) £999 (£100 off, RRP £1,099)
  • M3 15-inch MacBook Air, 256GB: £1,159.97 (£139 off, RRP £1,299)
  • M3 15-inch MacBook Air, 512GB: £1,279.97 (£219 off, RRP £1,499)
  • 14-inch MacBook Pro with M3 (8-core CPU, 10-core GPU), 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD: £1,499 (£200 off, RRP £1,699)
  • 14-inch MacBook Pro with M3 (8-core CPU, 10-core GPU), 8GB RAM, 1TB SSD: £1,599.97 (£250 off, RRP £1,899)
  • 14-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Pro (11-core CPU, 14-core GPU), 18GB RAM, 512GB SSD: £1,899 (£200 off, RRP £2,099)
  • 14-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Pro (12-core CPU, 18-core GPU), 18GB RAM, 1TB SSD: £2,230 (£269 off, RRP £2,499)
  • 16-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Pro (12-core CPU, 18-core GPU), 18GB RAM, 512GB SSD: £2,339.97 (£259 off, RRP £2,599)

Prime Day 2024: Best Mac accessory deals

Prime Day is also a great opportunity to save some cash on some accessories for your MacBook. Perhaps you need a spare or just a beefier charger for your MacBook. Or perhaps you want a dock, a printer, or a bag. If we spot a good deal we’ll list it here.

We also have separate round-ups for the Best Prime Day Mac monitor and display deals and Best Prime Day storage deals for Mac. Plus find a cut-price Apple keyboard, mouse or Trackpad: Best Prime Day Apple accessories deals.

U.S. Mac accessory Prime Day deals

  • Magic Keyboard with Touch ID & Numeric keypad: $112 ($17 off, MSRP $129)
  • Magic TrackPad: $110 ($19 off, MSRP $129
  • Magic Mouse (black): $91 ($8 off, MSRP $99)

U.K. Mac accessory Prime Day deals

  • Magic Keyboard with Numeric Keypad: £95 (£34 off, RRP £129) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • Magic Keyboard: £75 (£24 off, RRP £99) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • Magic Mouse (black): £69 (£30 off, RRP £99) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • Magic Mouse (white): £53 (£26 off, RRP £79) PRIME BIG DEAL

Prime Day 2024: How can I get the best Mac deals?

Once this Prime Day begins, most deals will be exclusive for Prime members, so you’ll need to sign in with an active membership to purchase one of the deals. Prime memberships cost $139/£95/AUD$59 annually, or $14.99/ £8.99/AUD$6.99 monthly. New users can sign up for a 30-day free trial that can be canceled at any time during the trial window. As well as access to sales prices, Prime members also get free two-day shipping and access to Prime Video and all the content available on that service.
